name: Cursed Knight (Ponto)
description:
Short platformer game made for Mini Jam 81 made in Godot.

Controls:

  • Left/right arrow keys to move
  • Z - Jump
  • X - Dash Attack
  • R - Reset game

Story: You are a knight working to rescue your beloved from a graveyard, filled with evil creatures. Imbued with a cursed power that revives you at the cost of your humanity, you bravely march forth into the graveyard.

In this game, you can die as much as you'd like, transforming into a super powered undead form. The amount of times you die will affect your ending, however, so try not to die too much.

There are 3 different endings for the game. Game is really short so you can try for all the endings if you really want to.

Tip: If you're stuck, try dash attacking on the blue lanterns.

All graphics made by me (Ponto)
